author: barnabasbusa

author: parithosh
content:
One of the discussions at devcon was a new line of non-finality devnets. There have been some scenarios suggested, so we'd likely just start off with the most urgent case first and continue with the others later on. 

TLDR:
- cloud VMs, 8c/32GB/20mbps down & 10mbps up, geo distributed
- 1M validators, mainnet distribution, keep some keys for devs to run at home
- 1d finalizing, 3d non-finality
- fill it with blobs @ target and txs with eth_calls
- Check if all client teams have metrics for it
- generate a prometheus config to run at home and ship metrics to pandaops metrics server

future versions:
- v1 has even split of clients offline
- retry with devnet-5 + increasing the blob count
- with one client failing
- with hydra
- non-finality for 2 weeks
